con:part.con:content: <application xmlns:soa="http://www.oracle.com/soa/rest" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:eo="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Resilience/Project/V1" xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc title="ProjectES_rest">ProjectES REST Service</doc> <grammars> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Resilience/Project/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../EnterpriseObjects/Resilience/Project/V1/ProjectEO.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </grammars> <resources> <resource path="/create"> <method name="POST" soa:wsdlOperation="create"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="eo:ESBMsg"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="eo:ESBMsg"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/query"> <method name="POST" soa:wsdlOperation="query"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="eo:ESBMsg"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="eo:ESBMsg"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/update"> <method name="POST" soa:wsdlOperation="update"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="eo:ESBMsg"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="eo:ESBMsg"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Resilience/Project/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Resilience/Project/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" schemaLocation="../../../Common/V1/CommonComponents.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Referenced Elements =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="ProjectType" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="ProjectStatus" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="ProjectName" type="com:NameType"/> <xsd:element name="ProjectDescription" type="com:TextType"/> <xsd:element name="ExpenditureType" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="ExpenditureDescription" type="com:TextType"/> <xsd:element name="TaskName" type="com:NameType"/> <xsd:element name="TaskDescription" type="com:TextType"/> <xsd:element name="ExpenditureDate" type="com:DateType"/> <xsd:element name="SupplierName" type="com:NameType"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionID" type="com:IDType"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionAmount" type="com:AmountType"/> <xsd:element name="AccountedAmount" type="com:AmountType"/> <xsd:element name="ProjectAmount" type="com:AmountType"/> <xsd:element name="InvoiceNumber" type="com:IDType"/> <xsd:element name="PONumber" type="com:IDType"/> <xsd:element name="Project" type="ProjectType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Project =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ProjectType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:ProjectIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ProjectType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ProjectName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ProjectDescription" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:TemplateName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:StartDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:EndDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:OrganizationName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ExpenditureType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ExpenditureDescription" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TaskName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TaskDescription" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ExpenditureDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SupplierName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransactionID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransactionAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AccountedAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ProjectAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="InvoiceNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PONumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ProjectStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= ESB Message =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="RqData" type="RqDataType"/> <xsd:element name="RsData" type="RsDataType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ESBMsg" type="ESBMsgType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RqDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Project" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="actionCode" type="ActionCodeType" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RsDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Project" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Action Codes =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Create"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QueryProjectCost"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ProjectCosting"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Update"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="CodeLists.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="Meta.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= EO IDs =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Accounts =============--> <xsd:element name="AccountID" type="IDType"/> <!--============= Instruments =============--> <xsd:element name="CardID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="ChequeID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="ChequeBookID" type="IDType"/> <!--============= Misc =============--> <xsd:element name="NotificationID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="DocumentID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="TagID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="FileID" type="IDType"/> <!--============= Parties =============--> <xsd:element name="BillerID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="CustomerID" type="IDType"/> <!--============= Resilience =============--> <xsd:element name="BiometricID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="ListOfValuesID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="NationalIdentityID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="ProjectNumber" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="SignatureID" type="IDType"/> <!--============= Transactions =============--> <xsd:element name="BillID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="PaymentID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="TransferID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="CurrencyExchangeID" type="IDType"/> <!--============= Others =============--> <xsd:element name="BankID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="BranchID" type="IDType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= EO Identifiers =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Others =============--> <xsd:complexType name="BranchIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="BankID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="BankBIC" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="BranchID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="BranchIdentifier" type="BranchIdentifierType"/> <!--============= Accounts =============--> <xsd:complexType name="AccountIdentifierType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="BranchIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AccountID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="IBAN" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AccountCurrency" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="AccountIdentifier" type="AccountIdentifierType"/> <!--============= Instruments =============--> <xsd:complexType name="CardIdentifierType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="AccountIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CardID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CardNumber" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CardIdentifier" type="CardIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ChequeIdentifierType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="AccountIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ChequeID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ChequeIdentifier" type="ChequeIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ChequeBookIdentifierType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="AccountIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ChequeBookID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ChequeBookIdentifier" type="ChequeBookIdentifierType"/> <!--============= Misc =============--> <xsd:complexType name="NotificationIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="NotificationID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="NotificationIdentifier" type="NotificationIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="DocumentIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="DocumentID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DocumentIdentifier" type="DocumentIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="TagIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="TagID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="TagIdentifier" type="TagIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="FileIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FileID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FileIdentifier" type="FileIdentifierType"/> <!--============= Parties =============--> <xsd:complexType name="BillerIdentifierType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="AccountIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="BillerID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="BillerIdentifier" type="BillerIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CustomerIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="BankID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CustomerID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CustomerIdentifier" type="CustomerIdentifierType"/> <!--============= Resilience =============--> <xsd:complexType name="BiometricIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="BiometricID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="BiometricIdentifier" type="BiometricIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ListOfValuesIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ListOfValuesID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ListOfValuesIdentifier" type="ListOfValuesIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="NationalIdentityIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="NationalIdentityID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="NationalIdentityIdentifier" type="NationalIdentityIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProjectIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProjectNumber" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProjectIdentifier" type="ProjectIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SignatureIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="SignatureID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SignatureIdentifier" type="SignatureIdentifierType"/> <!--============= Transactions =============--> <xsd:complexType name="BillIdentifierType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="BillerIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="BillID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="BillIdentifier" type="BillIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PaymentIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="BankID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PaymentID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PaymentIdentifier" type="PaymentIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="TransferIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="BankID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransferID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="TransferIdentifier" type="TransferIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CurrencyExchangeIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CurrencyExchangeID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CurrencyExchangeIdentifier" type="CurrencyExchangeIdentifierType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Simple Referenced Elements =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="Amount" type="AmountType"/> <xsd:element name="BillAmount" type="AmountType"/> <xsd:element name="TotalAmount" type="AmountType"/> <xsd:element name="ChargeAmount" type="AmountType"/> <xsd:element name="NoOfLeaves" type="IntegerType"/> <xsd:element name="PayFromAccount" type="AccountReferenceType"/> <xsd:element name="PayeeAccount" type="AccountReferenceType"/> <xsd:element name="PayFromMobileWallet" type="MobileWalletType"/> <xsd:element name="PayeeMobileWallet" type="MobileWalletType"/> <xsd:element name="ValueDate" type="DateType"/> <xsd:element name="Rate" type="RateType"/> <xsd:element name="Remarks" type="TextType"/> <xsd:element name="BankBIC" type="CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="AccountCurrency" type="CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="UpdatedBy" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="ExchangeCurrency" type="CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="TagValue" type="TextType"/> <xsd:element name="UserName" type="NameType"/> <xsd:element name="TemplateName" type="NameType"/> <xsd:element name="MobileWalletVendor" type="NameType"/> <xsd:element name="EffectiveDate" type="DateType"/> <xsd:element name="StartDate" type="DateType"/> <xsd:element name="EndDate" type="DateType"/> <xsd:element name="ItemDate" type="DateType"/> <xsd:element name="OrganizationName" type="NameType"/> <xsd:element name="Role" type="NameType"/> <xsd:element name="ShortDescription" type="TextType"/> <xsd:element name="LongDescription" type="TextType"/> <xsd:element name="SupplierName" type="NameType"/> <xsd:element name="InvoiceNumber" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="CardNumber" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="PONumber" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="SignatureImage" type="xsd:base64Binary"/> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="CodeType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[^@]+@[^\.]+\..+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress" type="EmailAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="IBAN" type="IDType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Complex Referenced Elements =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="PartyReferenceType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="OrganizationName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="PersonName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="Address" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PartyReference" type="PartyReferenceType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AccountReferenceType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AccountIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PartyReference" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="AccountReference" type="AccountReferenceType"/> <xsd:complexType name="StopPaymentInstructionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestDateTime" type="DateTimeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ReasonCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ReasonDescription" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="StopPaymentInstruction" type="StopPaymentInstructionType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PersonNameType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FullName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="FirstName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="MiddleName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LastName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Title" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PersonName" type="PersonNameType"/> <xsd:complexType name="IdentityDocumentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="IdentityDocumentID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="IdentityDocumentSerialNumber" type="IDType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IdentityDocumentType" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IssueDate" type="DateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ExpirationDate" type="DateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IssuingCountry" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IssuingLocation" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IssuingAuthority" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DocImage1" type="xsd:base64Binary" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DocImage2" type="xsd:base64Binary" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="IdentityDocument" type="IdentityDocumentType"/> <xsd:element name="PrimaryIdentityDocument" type="IdentityDocumentType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PersonType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="PersonName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BirthDate" type="DateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BirthCountry" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BirthCityName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="GenderCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Language" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="NativeLanguage" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Nationality" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="MaritalStatus" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="MinorIndicator" type="IndicatorType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="NREIndicator" type="IndicatorType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Occupation" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="IdentityDocument" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SignatureImage" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Person" type="PersonType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CompanyType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CompanyName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IncorporationDate" type="DateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="RegistrationCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Company" type="CompanyType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AddressType" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineOne" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineTwo" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineThree" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineFour" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CityName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="StateName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CountyName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CountryName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PostalCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PreferredIndicator" type="IndicatorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Address" type="AddressType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PhoneType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PhoneType" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CompleteNumber" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AreaCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LocalNumber" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ExtensionNumber" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="PreferredIndicator" type="IndicatorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Phone" type="PhoneType"/> <xsd:complexType name="EmailType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EmailType" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress" type="EmailAddressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PreferredIndicator" type="IndicatorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Email" type="EmailType"/> <xsd:complexType name="BalanceType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BalanceType" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BalanceAmount" type="AmountType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Balance" type="BalanceType"/> <xsd:complexType name="TransactionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransactionID" type="IDType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionType" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionCategory" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionSerialNumber" type="IDType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionDescription" type="TextType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="InstrumentReferenceNumber" type="IDType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionAmount" type="AmountType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PostedDateTime" type="DateTimeType"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionDateTime" type="DateTimeType"/> <xsd:element ref="ValueDate" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Transaction" type="TransactionType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MobileWalletType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MobileNumber" type="IntegerType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="MobileUser" type="NameType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MobileWallet" type="MobileWalletType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DataTypes.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="LanguageCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Create"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Query"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QueryStatus"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Update"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Delete"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResponseCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Requester"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Business"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Enterprise"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Provider"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Business =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= BackOffice =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="FileBS"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Enterprise =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Accounts =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="AccountES"/> <!--============= Instruments =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="CardES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeBookES"/> <!--============= Misc =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="NotificationES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DocumentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TagES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FileES"/> <!--============= Parties =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="BillerES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CustomerES"/> <!--============= Resilience =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="BiometricES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ListOfValuesES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NationalIdentityES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ProjectES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SignatureES"/> <!--============= Transactions =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="BillES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PaymentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TransferES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CurrencyExchangeES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="StatementES"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="currencyCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BinaryObjectType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:base64Binary"> <xsd:attribute name="mimeCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="characterSetCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="fileName" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateTimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DurationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:duration"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IDType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IndicatorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:pattern value="false"/> <xsd:pattern value="true"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RateType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseValue" type="xsd:decimal" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseUnitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="URIType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YearType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gYear"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:pattern value="01"/> <xsd:pattern value="02"/> <xsd:pattern value="03"/> <xsd:pattern value="04"/> <xsd:pattern value="05"/> <xsd:pattern value="06"/> <xsd:pattern value="07"/> <xsd:pattern value="08"/> <xsd:pattern value="09"/> <xsd:pattern value="10"/> <xsd:pattern value="11"/> <xsd:pattern value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthDayType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gMonthDay"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PositiveIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NonNegativeIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="CommonComponents.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgID" type="com:IDType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Source" type="com:IDType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="com:MsgTypeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Service" type="com:ServiceType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="StatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Code" type="com:CodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Type" type="com:StringType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Text" type="com:TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Status" type="com:StatusType"/> </xsd:schema>
